relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore have shared the experience of living in Godric's Hollow and losing loved ones.
Lily is Harry's mother, indicating a family relationship between them.
James is Harry's father, indicating a family relationship between them.
Lily is Dumbledore's daughter-in-law, indicating a family relationship between them.
Hermione is someone who has appeared beside Harry in the crowd, indicating an acquaintance relationship between them.
Ron and Hermione are friends, as indicated by their interaction in the story.
